name: Salad in a Jar
author: Alli Shircliff
summary: Layer spinach, beets, carrots, and garbanzo beans in a canning jar and top with homemade dressing for a portable salad or a fun appetizer for dinner parties.
ingredients: 1 cup garbanzo beans (chickpeas), drained and rinsed
5  half-pint canning jars with lids and rings
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Layer 1/4 cup spinach, 1/4 cup beets, 1/4 cup garbanzo beans, and 1/4 cup shredded carrots in each of 4 jars
Combine olive oil, vinegar, mustard, honey, salt, and pepper in the remaining jar; place lid on jar
Shake until dressing is evenly combined
Pour 1/4 the dressing over each salad
